text: For a period of 2 years following March 10, 2004, all reference to a licensed marriage and family therapist shall be deemed to refer to a person meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether that person is licensed.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Qualifications for Licensure to Practice Marriage and Family Therapy; Transition of Licensed Marriage and Family Therapists.

heading.catch_text: Transition of licensed marriage and family therapists.
